newQuestions.question: A fixed ratio 5 (FR5) schedule delivers reinforcement:
newQuestions.explanation: FIXED RATIO (FR) schedules deliver reinforcement after a FIXED number of responses. FR5 = reinforcement after exactly every 5th response (5, 10, 15, 20...). Produces high, steady rates with post-reinforcement pause. VARIABLE ratio would be average of 5. Interval schedules are time-based, not response-based. FR schedules are common in piecework, sales commissions, frequent flyer miles.
newQuestions.reference: Cooper et al. (2020), Chapter 12; BACB Task List B-5
